scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.copy:frontend: npx -y shx rm -rf backend/public && npx -y shx mkdir backend/public && npx -y shx cp -r yojanasaathi/yojana/dist/* backend/public/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run start
